pages.text: $(o)Toathings$() adds multiple new plants to Birch Forests, namely, Pampas Grass and Resinous Polypores.$(br2)$(l)$(n)Pampas Grass$()$(br)Pampas Grass is a Tall Plant with a long stem that ends in a fluffy bud at the top. It grows anywhere that normal Tall Flowers grow, with the obvious exception of only growing in Birch Forests.
Pampas Grass commonly grows in small clusters similar to their real world counterpart.

$(l)$(n)Resinous Polypore$()$(br)Resinous Polypores are a unique species of mushrooms that grow on Logs. These can be found in Birch Forests growing on the side of trees and even fallen logs.$(br2)These mushrooms can only be placed on the side of blocks and can only be harvested with shears.
